waterOrVodka.title: Water or Vodka
waterOrVodka.description: Drink a shot of water or vodka. Have the group guess what you drank.

categories.title: Categories: {{category}}
categories.description: Say words after turn that belong to the category {{category}}. First to fail loses!

game.allVsAllDescription: All players compete against each other
game.allVsAllWinnerDescription: Select the player who performed best

challenges.createCustomChallengesDesc: Create custom challenges to spice up your game!
challenges.canReuse: Can be reused in the same game
challenges.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this challenge?
challenges.descriptionPlaceholder: Example: Drink a shot of water or vodka. Have the group guess what you drank.
challenges.recentChallengesDesc: Challenges you've created before will appear here for easy access.
challenges.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this challenge?
challenges.maxReuseCountHelp: Number of times a challenge can be reused in the same game

waterOrVodka.description: Drink a shot of water or vodka. Have the group guess what you drank.

settings.title: Settings
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset the app? All game data will be lost.
settings.resetGameWarning: By resetting the game, you will start over
settings.resetDataConfirmation: This will delete all app data including custom challenges. This action cannot be undone.

about.acknowledge: Glass is a fun party game app designed to be used responsibly. Please drink responsibly and ensure all participants are of legal drinking age in your country.

prebuilt.title: Prebuilt Challenges
prebuilt.description: Choose from our collection of ready-to-play challenge types. Just configure and go!
prebuilt.moreChallengesComingSoon: We're working on more exciting prebuilt challenges. Stay tuned!

spotifyMusicQuiz.title: Spotify Music Quiz
spotifyMusicQuiz.shortDescription: Host a music quiz using songs from a Spotify playlist. Perfect for testing your friends' music knowledge!
spotifyMusicQuiz.description: A music quiz with {{numberOfSongs}} songs played for {{playDurationSeconds}} seconds each. Guess the song and artist!
spotifyMusicQuiz.playlistUrlHelp: Paste a link to any public Spotify playlist. You can find this by clicking 'Share' on any playlist in Spotify.
spotifyMusicQuiz.spotifyLoginRequired: Spotify login required to browse your playlists
spotifyMusicQuiz.spotifyLoginHelp: Connect your Spotify account to access your playlists or use public playlist URLs.
spotifyMusicQuiz.loginToUseYourPlaylists: Log in to use your playlists
spotifyMusicQuiz.noPlaylistsMessage: We couldn't find any playlists in your Spotify account. Try creating a playlist first.
spotifyMusicQuiz.numberOfSongsHelp: How many songs to randomly select from the playlist (max 20).
spotifyMusicQuiz.challengeTypeHelp: Choose how players will compete in the music quiz.
spotifyMusicQuiz.pleaseWait: This may take a few moments...
spotifyMusicQuiz.noSongsMessage: We couldn't fetch any songs from the provided playlist. Please try again with a different playlist.
spotifyMusicQuiz.guessPrompt: Which song and artist is this?

quiz.title: Custom Quiz
quiz.shortDescription: Create a custom quiz with questions and images
quiz.description: Create and play a custom quiz with images for both questions and answers
quiz.addImages: Click to add images to this question
quiz.noCorrectOption: Question {{number}} needs a correct answer marked
quiz.emptyOptionText: Option {{optionNumber}} for question {{questionNumber}} is missing text
quiz.noQuestions: No questions available for this quiz
quiz.nobodyCorrect: No players selected the correct answer
quiz.dragDropImage: Drag and drop an image here or click to select
quiz.descriptionPlaceholder: Example: Guess which country each flag belongs to!
quiz.recordManually: Record answers manually. Players should write their answers on paper.

validation.invalidSpotifyUrl: Please enter a valid Spotify playlist URL
validation.maxValue: Value must be no more than {{max}}

error.title: Error
error.general: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.timeoutLoadingPlayers: Timeout loading players. Please try again.
error.loadingPlayers: Error loading players. Please try again.
error.loadingChallenges: Error loading challenges. Please try again.
error.loadingGames: Error loading games. Please try again.
error.errorChallengeNotAccessible: This challenge is not accessible. A new version will be created instead.

auth.spotifyRedirecting: Redirecting you back to the app...
auth.spotifyLoginInfo: Connect your Spotify account to access your playlists
auth.spotifyLoginHelp: This will allow Glass to browse your Spotify playlists and use them for music quizzes.
